Moreover, the thick corded fabric makes it perfect for fall events, and customers appreciate its high-quality look, with one noting it matches all skin tones. Additionally, the dress receives positive feedback for its comfort, quality, and flattering design. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a winter party
items.body: I have an engagement party to go to in December and was looking for a dress appropriate for the occasion, but comfortable enough to chase around two preschoolers and this is perfect. Elegant, gorgeous green color, and extremely comfortable. I am normally a size 4/6 and the small is perfect fit. Will be easy to style as well and had zero wrinkles coming out of the packaging. Update: I am wearing this to my 3rd winter event tonight and continue to love this dress! The engagement party, a date night, and now a work holiday party. So comfortable and throw on very quickly to look instantly put together! The emerald color feels very rich. For reference I’m 5”2’ and it’s perfect length with my boots with about a 2 inch heel. Read more
items.author: Student Baker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and Classy!
items.body: True to size and gorgeous. For reference I am approx. 150 pounds, 5'6" and athletic/curvy build - size medium fit perfectly. I was worried the dress would be too low cut for me to wear a bra (which oculd get away with, but my normal bra works perfectly. So soft and comfortable while feeling fancy. The color is gorgeous! Looking forward to wearing it for Holiday acrds and Thanksgiving day. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cocktail dress
items.body: I received many compliments wearing this dress. The neckline is low but I wore shapewear to help hide some of the cleveage. I'm 25 anymore. The dress was comfortable. The sleeves were a little tight and would creep up thats the reason for not giving a 5 star. I am 5'6 225. The quality of the fabric was nice and the color was perfect. The length kept me from having to wear hose which was perfect for here in the south. I ordered and XL. Great value for the price. Read more
items.author: MMurphy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress - fit is spot on... these types of dresses are usually too long for me - I am 5'4" and it was perfect - I did where 2.5 inch heels. Comfortable and very flattering! Read more
items.author: Elaine Artale

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!
items.body: Gorgeous dress. Perfect for a fall shower/wedding. Soft velvet material in a gorgeous emerald green color. Extremely comfortable and a very nice weight. Not see through at all. Excellent quality. TTS Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color off
items.body: Fits true to size however the color was not what was pictured. Still a pretty and comfortable dress though! Read more
items.author: nikhay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a beautiful dress for a reasonable price!
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! I purchased it to wear to go a gala I had to attend, and it was perfect for the occasion. The color is absolutely beautiful for autumn, and the velvet material is so comfortable! The dress does have a little bit of weight to it, but thats expected because of the material. The dress didn’t have me sweating, but still kept me warm.The dress is a little bit low cut , and because of the little bit of weight to it , the dress hung a little lower in the chest area then I wanted. I used a safety pin, and it was perfect! Easy fix! Also, I was so surprised that I didn’t need any alterations. I am only 5ft tall, and the dress wasn’t too long or dragging at all! I would 100% recommend this dress to anyone! Read more
items.author: Arianna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress
items.body: Buy. the. Dress. But size up. I ended up buying a small and a medium, the small fit like a glove very sexy but not long enough and didn’t fit/feel right around the breast area -but wasn’t noticeable- but still beautiful! High quality material, luxurious feeling and got so many compliments! The length could be longer in my opinion Read more
items.author: James Quinn

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: C#burnt Orange, A#leopard, C#dark Green, A#hazeblue, A#chocolate, C#coffee, A#lake Blue, Army Green, A#coffee, A#dark Green, C#black, A#burgundy, C#red, A#navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
